Article.title: Transfers or disclosures not authorised by Union law

conditions.body: Any judgment of a court or tribunal requiring a controller or processor to transfer or disclose personal data
Any decision of an administrative authority of a third country requiring a controller or processor to transfer or disclose personal data

rules.condition: The judgment or decision may only be recognized or enforceable
rules.requirement: if based on an international agreement
rules.example: such as a mutual legal assistance treaty
rules.status: in force between the requesting third country and the Union or a Member State

content.note: This is without prejudice to other grounds for transfer pursuant to this Chapter.
